house_listing.house_description: This "Designed for Living" American home is the answer to the American Dream! Large great room with tray ceiling! Additional office/study! Modern kitchen with semi-formal dining. Three spacious bedrooms and two baths. Exquisite master bedroom with a tray ceiling and accented with a posh master bath with a whirlpool tub and separate shower. Split walk-in closets and vanities. Quaint country porch and back porch make for fine outdoor living. Call or e-mail John today for a complete list of standard features. John’s e-mail address is jbchabot@aol.com.

highlights.item: Large Great Room and Additional Office/Study!
Spacious Bedrooms and Exquisite Master Suite!
Covered Front Porch and Large Back Porch!
